snippet: Abdullah Elshamy, an Al Jazeera reporter, had been detained without charges since last August.
abstract: Egyptian prosecutors will release hunger-striking journalist Abdullah Elshamy because of his deteriorating health; release is concession on treatment of one of more than 16,000 prisoners detained since the military takeover.
lead_paragraph: Abdullah Elshamy, an Al Jazeera reporter, had been detained without charges since last August.

headline.main: Egypt to Free Ill Journalist Who Staged Hunger Strike
headline.print_headline: Egypt to Free Ill Journalist Who Staged Hunger Strike
